price: Sesungguhnya Kami, tatkala air telah naik (sampai ke gunung) Kami bawa (nenek moyang) kamu ke dalam bahtera1507,
arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ
footnotes: 1507.  Yang dibawa dalam bahtera Nabi Nūḥ ‘Alaihissalām untuk diselamatkan ialah keluarga Nabi Nūḥ ‘Alaihissalām dan orang­orang yang beriman, selain anaknya yang durhaka.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā lammā ṭaghā al-māu ḥamalnākum fī al-jāriyati
